refnamediv.refpurpose: Lists the ident number of the specified region.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Lists the ident number of the specified region.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the whatid command to list the ident number of a specified region.

example.title: List the ident number of a specified region.
example.para: Gets the ident number for regiona.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>, or via the "cadbug.sh" script.
